title: 'Comfortable'
body: 'A great product at such an affordable price. Sofa is very comfy and is exactly as shown in the images.'

title: 'Sofa is really good.'
body: 'The media could not be loaded. 1. Large in size 2. Go for Black that will shine in day and night. 3. good in quality. 4. Seller is also co-operative and will do customisation if needed. Note: I have paid extra for table. If you need Centre table please get in touch with Seller.'

title: 'Delivery was worst'
body: 'Product is gud but delivery guy took 200 for delivery of the product. Product is nice and comfortable. L requires wall support for pillow support else product is good'

title: 'Sofa is awesome'
body: Sofa quality is very good and very comfortable... it's looking very elegant and stylish...  Special thanks to the seller ..he has performed the customization as per my requirements...I am very happy with product  Go ahead and buy this product
